name: Does It Matter (Phalistafer, kprakash)
description:
Description: 
You are a blob of matter that can shoot out its own mass. 

At any given moment, you control the blob with the largest mass in the scene. 

Different colored blobs interact differently with each other. 

Controls:

WASD to move. 

Left mouse to shoot. 

Press R to restart a level if you ever get stuck.

Background:

This game was designed and created in a single week for the Game Development Club at SJSU's Fall 2020 Game Jam. The theme of this Game Jam was "It Matters."

The Team:
Kevin "kprakash" Prakash - Lead Programmer, Game Designer

Josh Smith - Programmer, Game Designer, Song Writer

Edward "Phalistafer" Chang - Programmer, UI Designer
